sentence: The challenge was filed by the same coalition of constitutional scholars and liberal activists who unsuccessfully tried to block Rep. Madison Cawthorn from the GOP primary ballot in North Carolina.
author: Marshall Cohen
title: Groups try to disqualify Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene's candidacy over January 6

sentence: Sam Brodey, The Daily Beast If the worst thing Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-NC) did this month was call Ukraine's President a thug,? or get caught speeding multiple times with a revoked license, or accuse Speaker Nancy Pelosi of being an alcoholic, the 26-year-old MAGA-influencer would probably be just fine in his re-election bid.
author: Allison Quinn
title: Good News Roundup for Friday, March 25, 2022: Courage Is Contagious
